definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: David, son of [[יִשַׂי]], king of Israel, whose dynasty remained on the throne of Jerusalem till the Babylonian exile (cf. 2Sa 7:11–2Sa 7:15 etc.) (beloved one ? cf. Ba:NB 189; acc. to Sayce:Mod. Rev 1884, 158 ff. Rel. Bab. 53, 56 f. orig. Dodo, title of sun-god worshipped in Isr. cf. [[דודה]] n. divin. among E. Jordan Israelites MI:12)—[[דָּוִד]] alw. Ru Sa Ki (exc. 1Ki 3:14, 1Ki 11:4, 1Ki 11:36) Psalm Pr Ec Is Je; also 1Ch 13:6, Ez Eze 34:24, Eze 37:24, Eze 37:25 (c. 790 t.); [[דָּוִיד]] alw. Zc Ch (exc. 1Ch 13:6) Ezr Ne; also Am 6:5 (where gloss acc. to Peters:Hbr. Apr. 1886, p. 175) Am 9:11, Ho 3:5, Ez Eze 34:23, 1Ki 3:14, 1Ki 11:4, 1Ki 11:36, Ct So 4:4 (c. 276 t.);—first named 1Sa 16:13; cf. also Ru 4:17, Ru 4:22, 2Sa 1:1 +, 1Ki 1:1 +, 1Ki 2:1 +, etc. (v. supra); in titles of Ps 3-9, Ps 11-32, Ps 34-41, Ps 51-65, Ps 68-70, Ps 86, Ps 101, Ps 103, Ps 108 – Ps 110, Ps 122, Ps 124, Ps 131, Ps 133, Ps 138–Ps 145 (73 in all); also in Ps 18:51 (= 2Sa 22:51) Ps 72:20, Ps 89:36, Ps 89:50, Ps 122:5, Ps 132:1, Ps 132:11, Ps 132:17, [[עַבְדִּי]] ´[[ד]] (´[[י]] speaks) 2Sa 3:18, 2Sa 7:5, 2Sa 7:8 = 1Ch 17:4, 1Ch 17:7 cf. v:1Ch 17:26 = 1Ch 17:24, also 1Ki 8:24, 1Ki 8:25, 1Ki 8:26, 1Ki 8:66 = 2Ch 6:15, 2Ch 6:16, 2Ch 6:17, 2Ch 6:42, 1Ki 11:13, 1Ki 11:32, 1Ki 11:34, 1Ki 11:36, 1Ki 11:38, 1Ki 14:8, 2Ki 8:19, 2Ki 19:34 = Is 37:35, 2Ki 20:6; cf. further Ps 18:1, Ps 36:1 (both titles cf. supr.) Ps 78:70, Ps 89:4, Ps 89:21, Ps 132:10, Ps 144:10, Je 33:21, Je 33:22, Je 33:26; so also as represented in coming (Messianic) ruler Ez Eze 34:23, Eze 34:24, Eze 37:24, Eze 37:25, cf. Ho 3:5, Je 30:9 (v. [[עֶבֶד]]). Phrases are:

LXX Targum We Dr; 2Sa 3:5 rd. prob. name of a former husband of Eglah We Dr; 2Sa 13:39 rd. [[רוּחַ]] We:p.223 Dr; 2Sa 19:44 rd. [[בְּכוֹר]] (for [[בדוד]]) LXX The We Dr; insert [[דָּוִד]] 2Sa 9:11, 2Sa 15:32 & 2Sa 24:15 LXX We Dr; in 1Ch 18:12, Ps 60:1 [[אבשׁי]] & [[יואב]] are less orig. than [[דָּוִד]] 2Sa 8:13 We Dr).
